channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Supreme Court upholds law banning TikTok if it’s not sold by its Chinese parent company
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump says he talked with Chinese leader Xi Jinping about TikTok shortly before the Supreme Court unanimously upheld the federal law banning the app beginning Sunday unless it’s sold by its China-based parent company.

item.title: Border app that became ‘a salvation’ for migrants to legally enter the US may end
Driver in Texas migrant smuggling run that led to the deaths of 53 people pleads guilty
